text:
AmaWaterways Receives Three Wave Awards From TravelAge West
AmaWaterways, the world’s leading river cruise line, today announced that it has received three TravelAge West WAVE (Western Agents’ Vote of Excellence) awards for 2015. The company was recognized during the 2015 WAVE Awards Ceremony, held on June 11 in Marina del Rey, California.
AmaWaterways took top WAVE Awards honors in the following categories:
Best Onboard Dining, River Best Theme Cruise, River Best New Ship – AmaSonata, River
“The AmaWaterways team is proud to have been recognized by such a distinguished group of travel agent professionals, as part of this year’s WAVE Awards program,” said Kristin Karst, AmaWaterways’ Executive Vice President and Co-owner. “We are deeply passionate about helping travel professionals be successful and believe it starts with innovation in ship design, itineraries, amenities and services. It is an honor to have been recognized for our efforts in these areas.”
AmaWaterways was one of more than 170 companies, individuals and destinations that were celebrated by the readers of TravelAge West at the WAVE Awards ceremony. Honorees were recognized in 68 categories that spanned the cruise, tour operator, airline, rail, car rental, travel insurance, GDS, Consortia, hotel and resort and destination travel fields. The awards gave travel agents in the Western U.S. the opportunity to recognize the outstanding qualities and services of their travel supplier partners.
Travel agent professionals throughout the 14 Western states and readers of TravelAge West were invited to vote on the best-of-the-best from a list of Editor’s Pick award recipients that were chosen after careful review by Editor-in-Chief Ken Shapiro and the editorial team of TravelAge West. Review methods included product analysis, on-site visits, a survey of a select group of travel agents and online research.
Source: AmaWaterways
